name: Click to Progress
description:
Browser graphics turned out a bit buggy after export, downloadable works perfectly, though.

A simple clicker for Clicker Jam Spring 2022.

This was my first project in Clickteam Fusion. I consider this an alpha of what it is planned to become.

The idea is to build an educational tool by framing the education as the reward for clicking the countdown to zero. Every 100 clicks bring you one step closer to evolving humanity (11 steps total). Does it work for education? Honestly, somebody try it, then we'll know. But it beats reading a book, which was the point.

Final version is planned to include several branches of evolution beside the human one by giving options at key points.
